extendedInfo.description: Action puzzle âLINE ZOOKEEPERâ, which topped the free app chart across the world including Japan, the United States, Canada, Brazil, Hong Kong, Taiwan, China, and Korea, and played by more than 10 million users, has now joined the LINE GAMES with a new feature!The game is simple! Whether youâre familiar with the game or not, you can instantly join in the fun!  Compete with your LINE friends on the leaderboard! Or just enjoy the game at your own pace.ââHow to playâââHow to catch animals.Switch adjacent animals and make a row of three or more of the same kind to catch them!âWhat happens when you catch animals?Catch as many animals as you can to gain score! The best score will be recorded so compete with LINE friends for the top spot! ââTipsâââMaster active chaining!If you just sit and wait for animal panels to disappearâ¦ youâre missing out!While the animals you've caught are busy disappearing, you can be working on your next catch, and the next, and the next one after that! âKeep your eyes open for lucky animals!Each round, one chosen animal will specially give a boost to both your ATTACK and DEFENSE. These are lucky animals. Don't forget to watch for them when the round starts!âAim for a fever!Catch a certain number of animals from all types and it will trigger a fever!20 panels will change into lucky animal so donât miss your chance!

reviews.title: Game will close due to unauthorized application.
reviews.comment: Crashes on launch. Why am I not authorized? The game is free.

reviews.comment: The game crashes whenever I try to play; please fix!

reviews.title: Challenging
reviews.comment: This game is difficult in a good way and kind of odd too. I like it. Definitely needs a tutorial mode for new players, though. I don\342\200\231t recall seeing one.

reviews.comment: Can\'t login with my Line ID. Please fix!
reviews.author: Sherli Yong

reviews.title: Face other people?
reviews.comment: Can you add the ability to face other people over the network randomly like you can in Zookeeper Battle? This is getting boring and the boss is too easy. Its either face the boss or normal play. What is the point of this if you can\'t play against anybody?!

reviews.title: Complete dissatisfaction
reviews.comment: Unable to understand what to do and what wasn\'t going on, also took up WAY too much time  loading. Although I do enjoy Zookeeper Battle alot :-)
